outputs.output_descr: Restoration and Stabilisation of livelihoods project supports and builds resilience of communities affected by drought. The overall objective of the project is enhance recovery from drought impact and resilience capacities at community, county and national levels. The project has 3 outputs: 1) Restoration and protection of livelihoods and productive assets for sustainable recovery and development 2) Governance for Early Recovery and Disaser Risk Reduction including climate change awareness 3) Effective programme implementation and reporting

project_descr: Restoration and Stabilization of Livelihoods for Drought affected and Host Communities in Turkana and Garissa Districts
project_title: Restoration & Stabilization of Livelihoods for Host Comm
